languages.text: "В основном, в крови еретиков, ксеносов и предателей, {name}. Методы Инквизиции не всегда приглядны и зачастую требуют великих жертв. Но я предан Империуму, и его безопасность любой ценой — мой наивысший приоритет. В том числе, безопасность от таких как ты".

"Mostly the blood of heretics, xenos, and traitors, {name}. The Inquisition's methods aren't always decorous and often require great sacrifices. But I am loyal to the Imperium. Keeping it safe at any cost is my highest priority. And that includes keeping it safe from the likes of you."
languages.original_text: "В основном, в крови еретиков, ксеносов и предателей, {name}. Методы Инквизиции не всегда приглядны и зачастую требуют великих жертв. Но я предан Империуму, и его безопасность любой ценой — мой наивысший приоритет. В том числе, безопасность от таких как ты".

traits.locale_text: "Mostly the blood of heretics, xenos, and traitors, {name}. The Inquisition's methods aren't always decorous and often require great sacrifices. But I'm loyal to the Imperium. Keeping it safe at any cost is my highest priority. And that includes keeping it safe from the likes of you."

"Mostly the blood of heretics, xenos, and traitors, {name}. The Inquisition's methods aren't always decorous and often require great sacrifices. But I am loyal to the Imperium. Keeping it safe at any cost is my highest priority. And that includes keeping it safe from the likes of you."

"Mostly the blood of heretics, xenos, and traitors, {name}. The Inquisition's methods aren't always decorous and often require great sacrifices. But I am loyal to the Imperium. Keeping it safe at any cost is my highest priority. And that includes keeping it safe from the likes of you."

languages.text: “绝大部分都是异端分子、异形和叛徒的鲜血，{name}。审判庭的手段并不总是光明正大，而且往往伴随着重大的牺牲。但我忠于帝国，我的首要任务是不惜一切代价守护帝国的安全，保护它免受你这种人所害。”
languages.original_text: "Mostly the blood of heretics, xenos, and traitors, {name}. The Inquisition's methods aren't always decorous and often require great sacrifices. But I am loyal to the Imperium. Keeping it safe at any cost is my highest priority. And that includes keeping it safe from the likes of you."

traits.locale_text: “绝大部分都是异端分子、异形和叛徒的鲜血，{name}。审判庭的手段并不总是光明正大，而且往往伴随着重大的牺牲。但我忠于帝国，我的首要任务是不惜一切代价守护帝国的安全，保护它免受你这种人所害。”

languages.text: 「{name}さん、ほとんどが異端者や異種族、裏切者の血です。異端審問庁の手法は常に上常という訳ではなく、犠牲も大きい。だが、我は帝国に従順であります。どんな犠牲を払おうと、安全こそを最優先とするのです。その犠牲には、陛下のような者を排除することも含まれます」
languages.original_text: "Mostly the blood of heretics, xenos, and traitors, {name}. The Inquisition's methods aren't always decorous and often require great sacrifices. But I am loyal to the Imperium. Keeping it safe at any cost is my highest priority. And that includes keeping it safe from the likes of you."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}さん、ほとんどが異端者や異種族、裏切者の血です。異端審問庁の手法は常に上常という訳ではなく、犠牲も大きい。だが、我は帝国に従順であります。どんな犠牲を払おうと、安全こそを最優先とするのです。その犠牲には、陛下のような者を排除することも含まれます」

languages.text: «Es la sangre de herejes, xenos y traidores, {name}. Los métodos de la Inquisición no siempre son decorosos y a menudo requieren grandes sacrificios, pero soy leal al Imperium. Mantenerlo a salvo cueste lo que cueste es mi mayor prioridad. Y eso incluye mantenerlo a salvo de gente como usted».
languages.original_text: "Mostly the blood of heretics, xenos, and traitors, {name}. The Inquisition's methods aren't always decorous and often require great sacrifices. But I am loyal to the Imperium. Keeping it safe at any cost is my highest priority. And that includes keeping it safe from the likes of you."

traits.locale_text: «Es la sangre de herejes, xenos y traidores, {name}. Los métodos de la Inquisición no siempre son decorosos y a menudo requieren grandes sacrificios, pero soy leal al Imperium. Mantenerlo a salvo cueste lo que cueste es mi mayor prioridad. Y eso incluye mantenerlo a salvo de gente como usted».

languages.text: "Primär dem Blut von Ketzern, Xenos und Verrätern, {name}. Die Methoden der Inquisition sind nicht immer schicklich und erfordern oft große Opfer. Doch ich bin dem Imperium treu ergeben. Es um jeden Preis zu beschützen, ist meine oberste Priorität. Und dazu zählt auch, es vor Euresgleichen zu beschützen."
languages.original_text: "Mostly the blood of heretics, xenos, and traitors, {name}. The Inquisition's methods aren't always decorous and often require great sacrifices. But I am loyal to the Imperium. Keeping it safe at any cost is my highest priority. And that includes keeping it safe from the likes of you."

traits.locale_text: "Primär dem Blut von Ketzern, Xenos und Verrätern, {name}. Die Methoden der Inquisition sind nicht immer schicklich und erfordern oft große Opfer. Doch ich bin dem Imperium treu ergeben. Es um jeden Preis zu beschützen, ist meine oberste Priorität. Und dazu zählt auch, es vor Euresgleichen zu beschützen."

languages.text: « Peut-être, {name}, mais ce sang est principalement celui des hérétiques, des xénos et des traîtres. Certes, les méthodes de l'Inquisition ne sont pas toujours reluisantes et requièrent souvent de grands sacrifices, mais je reste loyal à l'Imperium. Mon devoir est de le protéger à tout prix, notamment des individus de votre espèce. »
languages.original_text: "Mostly the blood of heretics, xenos, and traitors, {name}. The Inquisition's methods aren't always decorous and often require great sacrifices. But I am loyal to the Imperium. Keeping it safe at any cost is my highest priority. And that includes keeping it safe from the likes of you."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être, {name}, mais ce sang est principalement celui des hérétiques, des xénos et des traîtres. Certes, les méthodes de l'Inquisition ne sont pas toujours reluisantes et requièrent souvent de grands sacrifices, mais je reste loyal à l'Imperium. Mon devoir est de le protéger à tout prix, notamment des individus de votre espèce. »

languages.text: "Bu kanın çoğu kâfirlere, zenolara ve hainlere ait {name}. Engizisyon'un yöntemleri her zaman münasip olmayabiliyor. Çoğu zaman da büyük fedakârlıklar gerektiriyor. Ama ben, İmparatorluk'a sadığım. En büyük önceliğim onu ne pahasına olursa olsun korumak. Buna senin gibileri defetmek de dâhil."
languages.original_text: "Mostly the blood of heretics, xenos, and traitors, {name}. The Inquisition's methods aren't always decorous and often require great sacrifices. But I am loyal to the Imperium. Keeping it safe at any cost is my highest priority. And that includes keeping it safe from the likes of you."
